title: Ticket #4255: measure GPU utilization and report it for jobs
description:
In the same way that we report CPU utilization for each job, we should measure and report GPU utilization if at all possible.

This is requested specifically by ICECUBE, but will likely be of interest by others.

The amdconfig utility that comes with AMD's Catalyst driver reports utilization information as a percentage.
The nvidia-smi utility reports utilization as percentage for some cards (e.g. Tesla M2070) and not others (e.g. GTX690).
Superseded by #6477.
